alert.note: Alert for Baker County (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Boise (Southwestern Idaho and Eastern Oregon)
info.headline: Dense Fog Advisory issued December 06 at 6:18AM PST until December 06 at 10:00AM PST by NWS Boise
info.description: ...DENSE FOG ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 AM MST THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Visibility one quarter mile or less in dense fog. The areas of low visibilities will increase to above one quarter mile in most locations by this afternoon. * WHERE...In Idaho, Western Magic Valley. In Oregon, Baker County. * WHEN...Until 11 AM MST this morning. * IMPACTS...Hazardous driving conditions due to low visibility. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Icy and/or snow-covered roads will add to the travel hazard.
info.instruction: If driving, slow down, use your headlights, and leave plenty of distance ahead of you.
